H0.text: what is the name of india pakistan border. Radcliffe Line

H1.text: what is the name of india pakistan border. Indo-Pak Frontier

H2.text: what is the name of india pakistan border. Kashmir Border

H3.text: what is the name of india pakistan border. IB

A4.text: The Radcliffe Line was the boundary demarcated by the two boundary commissions for the provinces of Punjab and Bengal during the Partition of India.

A5.text: the term 'Radcliffe Line' is also sometimes used for the entire boundary between India and Pakistan.
